actions.description: An action defines the tasks the extension performs during the AppConfig workflow. Detailed below.

point.description: The point at which to perform the defined actions. Valid points are `PRE_CREATE_HOSTED_CONFIGURATION_VERSION`, `PRE_START_DEPLOYMENT`, `ON_DEPLOYMENT_START`, `ON_DEPLOYMENT_STEP`, `ON_DEPLOYMENT_BAKING`, `ON_DEPLOYMENT_COMPLETE`, `ON_DEPLOYMENT_ROLLED_BACK`.
